00009 #import "IndividualListViewController.h"
00010 #import "AlertPrompt.h"
00011 #import "List.h"
00012 #import "ListArticle.h"
00013 #import "Article.h"
00014 #import "AddArticleListViewController.h"

00016 @implementation IndividualListViewController
00017 
00018 - (id)initWithList:(List*)list {
00019         if (self = [super initWithStyle:UITableViewStylePlain]) {
00020                 list_ = list;
00021                 
00022                 UIBarButtonItem *addButton = [[UIBarButtonItem alloc] initWithBarButtonSystemItem:UIBarButtonSystemItemAdd target:self action:@selector(addArticle)];
00023                 self.navigationItem.rightBarButtonItem = addButton;
00024                 [addButton release];
00025                 
00026                 NSFetchRequest *request = [[NSFetchRequest alloc] init];
00027                 request.entity = [NSEntityDescription entityForName:@"ListArticle" inManagedObjectContext:list_.managedObjectContext];
00028                 request.sortDescriptors = [NSArray arrayWithObject:[NSSortDescriptor sortDescriptorWithKey:@"article.name"
00029                                                                                                                                                                                  ascending:YES
00030                                                                                                                                                                                   selector:@selector(caseInsensitiveCompare:)]];
00031                 request.predicate = [NSPredicate predicateWithFormat:@"list = %@", list_];
00032                 request.fetchBatchSize = 20;
00033                 
00034                 NSFetchedResultsController *frc = [[NSFetchedResultsController alloc]
00035                                                                                    initWithFetchRequest:request
00036                                                                                    managedObjectContext:list_.managedObjectContext
00037                                                                                    sectionNameKeyPath:nil
00038                                                                                    cacheName:nil];
00039                 frc.delegate = self;
00040                 
00041                 [request release];
00042                 
00043                 [self setFetchedResultsController:frc];
00044                 [frc release];
00045                 
00046                 self.titleKey = @"article.name";
00047                 self.searchKey = @"article.name";
00048         }
00049         return self;
00050 }

00052 #pragma mark -
00053 #pragma mark Core data table view overrides
00054 
00055 - (BOOL)canDeleteManagedObject:(NSManagedObject *)managedObject {
00056         return YES;
00057 }
00058 
00059 - (void)deleteManagedObject:(NSManagedObject *)managedObject {
00060         Article *article = ((ListArticle*)managedObject).article;
00061         [list_.managedObjectContext deleteObject:managedObject];
00062         [list_.managedObjectContext deleteObject:article];
00063 }

00065 #pragma mark -
00066 #pragma mark Events
00067 
00068 // Called when the add button is pressed
00069 - (void)addArticle {
00070 /*      AlertPrompt *alertPrompt = [[AlertPrompt alloc] initWithTitle:@"Lägg till vara" delegate:self cancelButtonTitle:@"Avbryt" okButtonTitle:@"Lägg till"];
00071         [alertPrompt show];*/
00072         AddArticleListViewController *addArticleListViewController = [[AddArticleListViewController alloc] initInManagedObjectContext:list_.managedObjectContext];
00073         [addArticleListViewController setModalTransitionStyle:UIModalTransitionStyleFlipHorizontal];
00074         [self.navigationController pushViewController:addArticleListViewController animated:YES];
00075         [addArticleListViewController release];
00076 }
00077 
00078 #pragma mark -
00079 #pragma mark Alert prompt delegate
00080 
00081 #define alertViewButtonOK 1
00082 
00083 - (void)alertView:(AlertPrompt *)alertPrompt clickedButtonAtIndex:(NSInteger)buttonIndex {
00084         if (buttonIndex == alertViewButtonOK) {
00085                 Article *article = [NSEntityDescription insertNewObjectForEntityForName:@"Article" inManagedObjectContext:list_.managedObjectContext];
00086                 article.name = alertPrompt.textField.text;
00087                 ListArticle *listArticle = [NSEntityDescription insertNewObjectForEntityForName:@"ListArticle" inManagedObjectContext:list_.managedObjectContext];
00088                 listArticle.article = article;
00089                 listArticle.list = list_;
00090         }
00091 }
